hp.special: Nine times their level (number of d12 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Berserker Axe)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d12 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the reaver can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Invulnerable (3/Day)
entries: As a reaction, the Reaver ignores all damage taken from one attack.

action.name: 5th Level: Frenzy (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the Reaver immediately makes three signature attacks that score a critical hit on a 18-20.

action.name: 7th Level: Fearful Yawp (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the Reaver roars with bestial might. Enemies within 30 feet must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for one minute (save ends at end of turn). On each of their turns, a {@condition frightened} creature must take the action and move away from the reaver by the safest route unless there is nowhere to move.

hp.special: Nine times their level (number of d12 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Ancestral Blade)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5ft., or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the spirit warden can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Grizzly Resistance (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the spirit warden grants themself and their mentor resistance to all damage until the end of the spirit warden's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Raptor Dive (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the spirit warden uses the Dash action. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: 7th Level: Ferocious Whirlwind (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the spirit warden immediately makes a signature attack against all adjacent enemies, dealing an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) slashing damage on a hit.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Rapier Wit)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5ft. or 60ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage. This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when the loremaster reaches 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

action.name: 3rd Level: Insult (3/Day)
entries: When a creature within 60 feet that the loremaster can see makes an attack, ability check, or damage roll, the loremaster can use a reaction to subtract {@dice 1d6} from that creature's result.

action.name: 5th Level: Soothing Song (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the loremaster plays an inspiring tune, allowing all allies within 60 feet to spend a Hit Die in order to regain {@dice PBd6} hit points.

action.name: 7th Level: Fireball (1/Day)
entries: Spell {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (A Storied Blade)
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the troubadour can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Cheer (3/Day)
entries: When an ally within 60 feet that the troubadour-warrior can see makes an attack, the troubadour can use a reaction to add {@dice 1d6} to the ally's result.

action.name: 5th Level: Bolstering Praise (1/Day)
entries: When an ally hits an enemy creature, the troubadour-warrior can use a reaction to convert the hit into a critical hit.

action.name: 7th Level: Distracting Taunt (3/Day)
entries: When a creature that the troubadour-warrior can see within 60 feet of them hits their mentor, the troubadour-warrior can use a reaction to force the creature to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the attack misses.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

entries: Spell. {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}.

action.name: 3rd Level: Minor Heal (5/Day)
entries: Spell. As an action, the healer restores {@dice PBd6} hit points to a creature they can see within 30 feet.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} bludgeoning damage. Beginning at 7th level, the battle priest can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: {@spell Spiritual Weapon} (3/Day)

action.name: 3rd Level: {@spell Moonbeam} (3/Day)

action.name: Signature Attack (Sickle)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: {@damage 2d4 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the battle priest can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Transform - Dire Wolf (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the skinwalker assumes the shape of a dire wolf for 1 minute. While in this form, the skinwalker's signature attack deals {@damage 2d6 plus PB} piercing damage. Their movement increases to 50 feet, they gain advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell, and they have advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the skinwalker's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}. A skinwalker can only be in one form at a time.

action.name: 5th Level: Transform - Allosaurus (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the skinwalker assumes the shape of an allosaurus for 1 minute. While in this form, the skinwalker's signature attack deals {@damage 2d10 plus PB} piercing damage. Their movement increases to 60 feet, and if they move at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits with their signature attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and the skinwalker can make another signature attack against them as a bonus action. A skinwalker can only be in one form at a time.

action.name: 7th Level: Transform - Giant Scorpion (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the skinwalker assumes the shape of a giant scorpion for 1 minute. While in this form, the skinwalker's {@variantrule Armor Class|XPHB} increases to 17, and their signature attack deals {@damage 1d10 plus PB} piercing damage and forces the target to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage PBd10} poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A skinwalker can only be in one form at a time.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Knightly Sword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the knight-sorcerer can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: {@spell Shield} (3/Day)
entries: Spell.

action.name: 5th Level: {@spell Thunderwave} (3/Day)
entries: Spell. {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}.

action.name: 7th Level: War Magic (3/Day)
entries: The knight-sorcerer casts the spell Firebolt as a bonus action. Spell attack: +3 plus PB.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Two-Handed Sword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d8 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the swordmaster can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Gaping Wound (3/Day)
entries: Immediately after hitting with a signature attack, the swordmaster can cause the target to start bleeding. The target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage at the start of each of their following turns ({@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution save ends at end of turn).

action.name: 5th Level: Challenge (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the swordmaster issues a challenge to an adjacent creature. For 1 minute, if that creature attempts to attack a target other than the swordmaster, or attempts to move away from the swordmaster, the swordmaster immediately makes two attacks with their signature attack against that creature, ending the Challenge.

action.name: 7th Level: Retaliate (3/Day)
entries: After being hit by a melee attack, the swordmaster can use a reaction to immediately make three signature attacks against the attacker.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Commander's Standard)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d12 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the warlord can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Commanding Strike (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the warlord makes a signature attack then selects an ally within 30 feet who can see and hear the warlord and has line of sight to the target of the signature attack. That ally makes a weapon attack against the target.

action.name: 5th Level: Charge (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the warlord makes a signature attack and selects an ally who can immediately move up to 30 feet and make an attack or cast a spell.

action.name: 7th Level: Rallying Cry (3/Day)
entries: All allies within 60 feet gain {@dice PBd8} temporary hit points.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Empty Hand)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d4 plus PB} bludgeoning damage. Beginning at 7th level, the acolyte of the way can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Fists of Fury (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the acolyte makes two signature attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target is knocked back 5 feet.

action.name: 5th Level: Stunning Follow-up (3/Day)
entries: When the acolyte of the way takes damage from an adjacent creature, the acolyte can use a reaction to immediately make two signature attacks against their attacker. If both attacks hit, the attacker is {@condition stunned} until the end of the acolyte of the way's next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Body and Soul (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the acolyte recovers {@dice PBd10} hit points.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Pressure-point Strikes)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d4 plus PB} bludgeoning damage. Beginning at 7th level, the acolyte of darkness can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: {@spell Darkness} (3/Day)
entries: Spell.

action.name: 5th Level: Shadow Drain (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the acolyte of darkness makes two signature attacks. If both attacks hit, the acolyte recovers {@dice PBd8} hit points.

action.name: 7th Level: Shadow Door (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the acolyte of darkness teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see and makes two signature attacks.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Three-section Staff)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} bludgeoning damage. Beginning at 7th level, the elemental acolyte can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Wind (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the elemental acolyte causes intense winds swirl around the ends of the elemental acolyte's weapon, causing its next two attacks to deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Water (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the acolyte makes a signature attack and assumes a stance that lets them dodge all incoming melee attacks until the start of their next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Earth (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the elemental acolyte stomps the ground, dislodging two large pieces of earth, and kicks them toward a target within 30 feet. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage PBd12} bludgeoning damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Shining Lance)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d12 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the cavalier can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Radiant Lance (3/Day)
entries: After successfully hitting with a signature attack, the cavalier can cause their lance to glow with radiant light, making the attack deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: 5th Level: {@spell Lesser Restoration} (1/Day)
entries: Spell.

action.name: 7th Level: Fight Me, Knave! (3/Day)
entries: If an adjacent ally would be hit by a weapon attack, the cavalier can use a reaction to be hit instead then make a signature attack against the attacker.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Executioner's Sword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the justicar can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Terrifying Strike (3/Day)
entries: The justicar makes a signature attack. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom save or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: {@spell Hunter's Mark} (3/Day)
entries: Spell.

action.name: 7th Level: Duel (3/Day)
entries: The justicar issues a holy decree challenging an enemy to a duel. That enemy must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw. If they fail, they have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the justicar and cannot move away from the Justicar for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). The Duel also ends if the justicar moves away from the target or attacks any other creature.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Arming Sword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the knight can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Twisting Vines (3/Day)
entries: The knight makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target is {@condition restrained}. They can make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check on its turn to escape. If they escape, the vines wither and die.

action.name: 5th Level: {@spell Entangle} (1/Day)
entries: Spell. {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}

action.name: 7th Level: {@spell Moonbeam} (1/Day)
entries: Spell. {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Yew Bow)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the beast lord can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Hawk Strike (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the beast lord summons a hawk to attack the eyes of a creature within 60 feet. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Wolf Pack (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the beast lord summons spectral wolves around every enemy within 60 feet. They grant the beast lord's allies advantage on all weapon attacks until the end of the beast lord's next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Bear Slam (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the beast lord summons a dire bear who attacks an enemy within 60 feet. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained} for one minute. At the start of each of its following turns, the target takes 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage and can make a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check against the same DC to escape. If they escape, the bear disappears.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Hunter's Bow)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 +  PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the beast lord can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: {@spell Hunter's Mark} (3/Day)
entries: Spell.

action.name: 5th Level: {@spell Pass Without Trace} (3/Day)
entries: Spell.

action.name: 7th Level: Watch Out, Boss! (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the tracker can see enters a space adjacent to the tracker's leader, the tracker may use its reaction to make a signature attack against that creature. On a hit, the attack also knocks the target {@condition prone}.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Blackened Knives)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d4 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the executioner can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Garrote (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the executioner whips a serrated wire around an adjacent creature's neck, dealing 10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage. The creature must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. At the start of the executioner's turn, they can use their action to automatically deal {@damage 3d6} slashing damage to the {@condition restrained} creature. During its turn, the {@condition restrained} creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check to break free.

action.name: 5th Level: Dagger Storm (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the executioner throws a barrage of shadowy daggers at all enemies within 10 feet. Targets must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage PBd6} piercing damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: 7th Level: Final Strike (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the executioner disappears in a cloud of shadow, reappearing behind a chosen enemy creature within 60 feet. The executioner makes two signature attacks, dealing an extra {@damage PBd6} force damage on each hit.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Clever Blade)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the guild adept can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Out of Phase (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the guild adept casts {@spell blur} on themselves and their mentor.

action.name: 5th Level: Who's Side Are You On?! (1/Day)
entries: As a spell action, the guild adept picks two enemy creatures adjacent to each other within 30 feet. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or immediately attack the other.

action.name: 7th Level: Vanish (1/Day)
entries: As a spell action, the guild adept turns themself or their mentor {@condition invisible}. This spell lasts until the end of the target's next turn.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Short Swords)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the cutpurse can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Low Blow (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the cutpurse makes a signature attack against a weak point on an enemy creature, causing them to fall {@condition prone} on a hit. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on all attacks they make until the end of its next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Flash Powder (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the cutpurse throws a satchel of powder at a point they can see within 60 feet, which explodes in a blinding flash. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: 7th Level: Smoke Bomb (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the cutpurse throws a smoke bomb at a point they can see within 30 feet, making a 20-foot radius choking cloud that spreads around corners and lasts for one minute. Any creature that enters the cloud or starts its turn there must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, they take {@damage PBd8} poison damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

hp.special: Six times their level (number of d6 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack ({@spell Fire Bolt})
entries: Spell attack, {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit.

action.name: 3rd Level: Fire Breath (3/Day)
entries: Spell. As an action, the thaumaturgist breathes fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage PBd8} fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

action.name: 5th Level: Dragon's Roar (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the thaumaturgist roars with draconic might. Each enemy within 60 feet must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. Furthermore, a {@condition frightened} creature must take the Dash action and move away from the thaumaturgist by the safest route unless there is nowhere to move.

action.name: 7th Level: Fire Wave (3/Day)
entries: Spell. As an action, the thaumaturgist radiates a wave of fire in a 10-foot radius centered on themselves. Each creature caught in the wave must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or take {@damage PBd10} fire damage and be pushed back 10 feet. On a success, they take half as much damage and are not pushed back.

hp.special: Six times their level (number of d6 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Random Cantrip)
entries: Spell. Roll {@dice 1d4}: 1 = acid splash, 2 = fire bolt, 3 = poison spray, 4 = ray of frost. {@variantrule Spell Attack|XPHB} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit; save {@dc 10 plus PB}.

action.name: 3rd Level: Random Boon (3/Day)
entries: Spell. Roll {@dice 1d4}: 1 = blur, 2 = enhance ability, 3 = invisibility, 4 = mirror image.

entries: Spell. Roll {@dice 1d4}: 1 = fireball, 2 = lightning bolt, 3 = sleet storm, 4 = stinking cloud. {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 10 plus PB}.

action.name: 7th Level: Random Working (1/Day)
entries: Spell. Roll {@dice 1d4}: 1 = blight, 2 = ice storm, 3 = polymorph, 4 = fire wall. {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 10 plus PB}.
